string.text: We have breaking news! Modern social-economic studies have shown that Axel Faes is indeed very, very gay!

string.text: We will have further details after the intermission....

string.text: Oh no! An angry mob is already charging at my gay-parade castle, they want to destroy this gayness. Quick player, HELP ME!
